Articles.Content:
The team here at Squad would like to announce that as of today (May 13th, 2013), Artyom Zuev (Bac9), will be joining Team Kerbal as a Content Developer.

As anyone who has seen the amazing work Artyom has done in the community can tell, we are certain he not only will be an incredible asset, but a key part in making the future of KSP even brighter.

Squad would like to welcome Artyom to the team and we look forward to seeing the amazing content heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be making for our users.

Thank you,

Adrian Goya

Edited May 13, 2013 by Capt'n Skunky
